== Description ==
Holder for the '<tt>format_to_post</tt>' filter. Deprecated in [[Version_3.9|3.9.0]]. Use [[Class_Reference/wpdb|wpdb::prepare()]] instead.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php format_to_post( $content ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$content|string|The text to pass through the filter.}}

== Return Values ==
; (string) : Text returned from the '<tt>format_to_post</tt>' filter.
